contentrichtext.text: {{nihongo|'''Kusu'''|楠町|Kusu-chō}} was a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Mie District, Mie|Mie District]], [[Mie Prefecture|Mie]], [[Japan]]. On February 7, 2005 Kusu was merged into the city of [[Yokkaichi, Mie|Yokkaichi]]. As of 2003, the town had an estimated [[population]] of 11,153 and a [[population density|density]] of 1,437.24 persons per km². The total area was 7.76 km². ==External links== * [http://www.city.yokkaichi.mie.jp/ Official website of Yokkaichi] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Dissolved municipalities of Mie Prefecture]] {{Mie-geo-stub}}
